title: Truck driver pain and discomfort can be alleviated

title_detail.value: Truck driver pain and discomfort can be alleviated

summary: Almost 60 per cent of truck drivers in a recent Canadian study reported experiencing musculoskeletal (MSD) pain and discomfort on the job, even though it may be preventable.

summary_detail.value: Almost 60 per cent of truck drivers in a recent Canadian study reported experiencing musculoskeletal (MSD) pain and discomfort on the job, even though it may be preventable.
